MEET J

J Is a London based singer songwriter. J music is organic and sophisticated with a tropical twist. From uplifting acoustic songs to thoughtful lyrics ballads. He's here to enjoy himself and uplift others with the timeless message of Peace&Love.

J is singer, songwriter, based in London.
He wrote ,composed , arranged and performed all his songs .He also had a valuable collaboration by some of the most British musicians , Basil Isaacs on percussions,Dan Boardman on Trombone Tom Harrison and Miguel Gorodi on Trumpets ,Abraham Hampton a US piano player from Harlem and Paulo on Drums. His seminal work was recorded in a joyful atmosphere at the Residents Studios in north west London under the expertise of the sound engineer Ian Hansen from Indiana US. After 16 months of recording, the album was ready to sent for a final polishing at the Air studios in Hampstead to be mastered by the acclaimed sound mastering engineer John Webber.

J SONGS

  • Closer
  • Baby Baby Baby
  • Dear
  • Get Out
